Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/83rd
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 87th, Ashland, 79th and Racine due to street blockage near Racine/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 87th, Ashland, 79th. then resume their normal route on Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Racine/83rd.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Damen/79th
ShortDescription: Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 83rd, Western and 79th into terminal, due to street blockage near Damen/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 83rd, Western and 79th into terminal, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Damen/79th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop 'L' Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop 'L' Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop 'L' Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake.

Shuttle buses have been requested for the Pink Line from Polk to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

Shuttle buses have been requested for the Green Line from Ashland/Lake to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
